meanings.definition: The quality of being sweet or sugary in taste.
meanings.sent1: The sweetnesses of the cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: I love the natural sweetnesses of fresh fruits.
meanings.sent3: Her laughter had a sweetnesses that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The sweetnesses of her voice was like a melody to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The sweetnesses of the honey was so rich and satisfying.

meanings.definition: The pleasantness or charm of something.
meanings.sent1: The sweetnesses of the garden filled me with joy.
meanings.sent2: The sweetnesses of the small town atmosphere was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The sweetnesses of the surprise party brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent4: The sweetnesses of the old bookstore was like stepping into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The sweetnesses of the sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.

meanings.definition: The act of being kind or affectionate.
meanings.sent1: Her sweetnesses towards animals was truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The sweetnesses of his gesture made her day brighter.
meanings.sent3: The sweetnesses of their friendship was evident in every interaction.
meanings.sent4: The sweetnesses of her smile could light up a room.
meanings.sent5: The sweetnesses of their love was a beautiful thing to witness.
